panels.description: Total writes, cas_propose and cas_commit per table

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, keyspace, table) (rate(mcac_table_write_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, keyspace, table) (rate(mcac_table_cas_propose_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, keyspace, table) (rate(mcac_table_cas_commit_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Local Writes Throughput per Table

panels.description: Total writes, cas_propose and cas_commit per node

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(mcac_table_write_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(mcac_table_cas_propose_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(mcac_table_cas_commit_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Local Writes Throughput per Node

panels.description: Total writes, cas_propose and cas_commit per node and table

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (rate(mcac_table_write_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (rate(mcac_table_cas_propose_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (rate(mcac_table_cas_commit_latency_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Local Writes Throughput per Node and Table

panels.description: Write latency for local writes per table (98 - 999th percentile)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.98, sum by (cluster, keyspace, table, le) (rate(mcac_table_write_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (cluster, keyspace, table, le) (rate(mcac_table_write_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))
histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (cluster, keyspace, table, le) (rate(mcac_table_write_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))

panels.title: Local Write Latency per Table

panels.description: Write latency for local writes per node (98 - 999th percentile)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.98, sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, le) (rate(mcac_table_write_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, le) (rate(mcac_table_write_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))
histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, le) (rate(mcac_table_write_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))

panels.title: Local Write Latency per Node

panels.description: Write latency for local writes per table and per node  (98 - 999th percentile)

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.98, sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table, le) (rate(mcac_table_write_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table, le) (rate(mcac_table_write_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))
histogram_quantile(0.999, sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table, le) (rate(mcac_table_write_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])))

panels.title: Local Write Latency per Table and Node

panels.description: Pending threads per node, by thread pool name filtering threads possibly impacting writes

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, pool_name) (mcac_thread_pools_pending_tasks{pool_name=~"memtable_flush_writer|memtable_post_flush|migration_stage|counter_mutation_stage|mutation_stage|view_mutation_stage|misc_stage|secondary_index_management|hints_dispatcher", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Pending Tasks per Node

panels.description: Pending threads per node, by thread pool name filtering threads possibly impacting writes

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, pool_name) (mcac_thread_pools_total_blocked_tasks_total{pool_name=~"memtable_flush_writer|memtable_post_flush|migration_stage|counter_mutation_stage|mutation_stage|view_mutation_stage|misc_stage|secondary_index_management|hints_dispatcher", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Blocked Tasks per Node

panels.description: Pending threads per node, by thread pool name filtering threads possibly impacting writes

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, message_type) (rate(mcac_dropped_message_dropped_total{message_type=~"_trace|batch_store|batch_remove|counter_mutation|hint|mutation", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m]))

panels.title: Dropped Messages per Node

panels.description: Max & Average of the partition sizes, for each table

targets.expr: max by (cluster, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_estimated_partition_size_histogram{quantile="1", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
avg by (cluster, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_estimated_partition_size_histogram{quantile=".50", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Max & Average Partition Size per Table

panels.description: Max & Average of the partition sizes, for each node

targets.expr: max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (mcac_table_estimated_partition_size_histogram{quantile="1", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
avg by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (mcac_table_estimated_partition_size_histogram{quantile=".50", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Max & Average Partition Size per Node

panels.description: Max & Average of the partition sizes, for each combination of table and node

targets.expr: max by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_estimated_partition_size_histogram{quantile="1", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
avg by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, keyspace, table) (mcac_table_estimated_partition_size_histogram{quantile=".50", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Max & Average Partition Size per Table and Node

panels.description: Maximum CPU utilisation (max 100%)

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{type="idle", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))))

min by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{type="idle", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))))

avg by (cluster) (1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{type="idle", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_cpu_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))))

panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: Max Unix load on a node for a cluster

targets.expr: max by (cluster) (collectd_load_shortterm{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
min by (cluster) (collectd_load_shortterm{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})
avg by (cluster) (collectd_load_shortterm{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: Unix Load (1m rate)

panels.description: Maximum Memory allocated per usage (worst node) - excludes caches, buffers, etc

targets.expr: min by (cluster) (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (collectd_memory{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}))
max by (cluster, memory) (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance, memory) (collectd_memory{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}))

panels.title: Memory Utilisation

panels.description: Network In and Out per cluster

targets.expr: sum by (cluster) (rate(collectd_interface_if_octets_rx_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))
sum by (cluster) (rate(collectd_interface_if_octets_rx_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Network I/O

panels.description: Amount of context switching per second per host

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_contextswitch_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Context Switching

panels.description: Sum of all disks hits for writes per second, for each node

targets.expr: Sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_processes_io_ops_write_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Disk Writes IOPS - Total per Node

panels.description: Sum of all disks throughputs for writes per second, for each node

targets.expr: Sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(collectd_processes_io_octets_tx_total{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s]))

panels.title: Disk Writes Throughput - Total per Node

panels.description: Percentage of the time the node is *not* doing a GC, thus Cassandra is not stopped for GC

targets.expr: 1 - (sum by (cluster, dc, rack, instance) (rate(mcac_jvm_gc_time{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])) / 1000)

panels.title: Application Throughput (% time NOT doing GC)

panels.description: Garbage collection duration

targets.expr: rate(mcac_jvm_gc_time{cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}[1m:30s])

panels.title: Garbage Collection Time

panels.description: JVM Heap Memory size (worst node) and minimum available heap size per node

targets.expr: mcac_jvm_memory_used{memory_type="heap", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"}

min by ( cluster)
        (mcac_jvm_memory_max{memory_type="heap", cluster="$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$node"})

panels.title: JVM Heap Memory Utilisation
